sentences.sContent: What can I do to kill time on the airplane?
sentences.sContent_eng: What can I do to kill time on the airplane?
sentences.sCn: 在飞机上，我能做些什么消磨时间呢？

sentences.sContent: These instruments measure movement, like that of a car or airplane.
sentences.sContent_eng: These instruments measure movement, like that of a car or airplane.
sentences.sCn: 这类仪器可以测量运动，像飞机和汽车的运动。

sentences.sContent: CROSSFEED, An interconnection between fuel manifolds for fuel flow from one side of the airplane to an adjacent engine or one on the other side.
sentences.sContent_eng: CROSSFEED, An interconnection between fuel manifolds for fuel flow from one side of the airplane to an adjacent engine or one on the other side.
sentences.sCn: 交输， 燃油支管之间的交连设备。 可使燃油从飞机一侧流向邻近的发动机或在机身另一侧的发动机。

trans.tranOther: a vehicle that flies through the air and has one or more engines
